org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.tamino
Interface IAeTaminoDataSource

All Superinterfaces:
IAeXMLDBDataSource
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeTaminoDataSource
public interface IAeTaminoDataSource
extends IAeXMLDBDataSource

An interface that defines the set of methods needed to give access to the Tamino database.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String COLLECTION
          A key into the config map (the Tamino collection to use).
static java.lang.String DATABASE
          A key into the config map (the Tamino database to use).
static java.lang.String DOMAIN
          A key into the config map (a windows domain to use for Tamino auth).
static java.lang.String URL
          A key into the config map (the URL to the Tamino server).
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getCollectionName()
          Returns the name of the collection this data source is configured for.
